trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time the Nest Protect you specify detects warning smoke levels.
This Trigger fires evert time the Nest Protect you specify detects low batteries.
This Trigger fires every time the Nest Protect you specify detects warning carbon monoxide levels.
This Trigger fires every time the Nest Protect you specify detects dangerous smoke levels.
This Trigger fires every time the Nest Protect you specify detects dangerous carbon monoxide levels.
